data.description: Prime Location: A stone's throw from historic downtown Ball Ground. Dive into the local culture with easy access to shopping, restaurants, and major highways.  Elegant Upgrades: This isn't just any home; it's a space meticulously crafted with upgraded touches that stand out in every corner.  Spacious Garage: A commodious 2-car garage ensures ample space for your vehicles and storage.  Outdoor Perfection: Positioned on an oversized corner lot, this home boasts a privacy-fenced backyard. The large storage shed offers additional space for tools or hobbies.  Porch Pleasures: Begin or end your day on the welcoming rocking chair front porch, taking in the serene surroundings.  Interior Excellence:  Grand Entrance: The 2-story foyer leaves a lasting first impression.  Thoughtfully Designed Living Spaces: A formal living room/office and dining room grace one end of the home, ensuring spaces for both entertainment and quiet evenings.  Open Floor Plan: The Great Room, Kitchen, and Breakfast Nook flow seamlessly, creating a cohesive space ideal for family gatherings.  Masterful Suite: Nestled upstairs, the master suite is a retreat. Featuring a soaking tub to melt the day away, a spacious walk-in closet for your wardrobe needs, and a double vanity for easy mornings.  Entertainer’s Dream Backyard:  Magazine-Worthy: It's not just a backyard; it's a backdrop for memories. So picturesque it's worthy of gracing a magazine cover.  Stunning Fire Pit: Gather around for stories, smores, or simply enjoy the warmth on a chilly evening.  Room to Play and Entertain: With a privacy fence securing the expanse, you have a level yard perfect for games, gatherings, and gardening.  Experience the best of design, location, and ambiance. This home is more than just walls and floors; it's a lifestyle awaiting its next chapter with you.
